comp5134.pos.domain

Class Merchant

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp5134.pos.domain.Merchant

  • public final class Merchant
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store the merchant details, which properties are gathered from SystemSetting.java
    Author:
    Raymond Kwan
